Articles.Content:
Hello.

I use a lot of mods including KW Rocketry. So I'd rather not install another large parts pack, but would like to find a cargo bay with working doors. The only individual ones I've seen haven't been updated for 0.23. I'm wondering if anyone knows of some good ones that don't require lots of other stuff that would need to be installed.

Thanks.
B9 aerospace has plenty of cargo bays.
What size cargo bays do you need?
Doesn't it have a fairly large amount of parts though? I might be wrong, but I think it also requires additional plugins.

B9 does have a lot of parts but you can throw them away after you installed B9. I think you need only 5-20 parts to get the cargo bays to work. If you have Texture reducer thing then B9 load also very quick.
